amendment.description: Amendment allocates $10 million to allow the Army Corps of Engineers to address both navigation and ecosystem restoration along the Upper Mississippi River and Illinois Waterway system through the Navigation and Ecosystem Sustainability Program (NESP).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $10,000,000 within Corps of Engineers, Investigations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
